languages.text: "Я наш{mf|ел|ла} странное рукописное письмо на столе Теодоры, подписанное К.К. Речь о его содержимом?"

traits.locale_text: "Я наш{mf|ел|ла} странное рукописное письмо на столе Теодоры, подписанное К.К. Речь о его содержимом?"

languages.text: "I came across a strange handwritten letter on Theodora's desk. It was signed X.C. You are referring to the contents of that note, I presume?"
languages.original_text: "Я наш{mf|ел|ла} странное рукописное письмо на столе Теодоры, подписанное К.К. Речь о его содержимом?"

traits.locale_text: "I came across a strange handwritten letter on Theodora's desk. It was signed X.C. You are referring to the contents of that note, I presume?"
"I came across a strange handwritten letter on Theodora's desk. It was signed X.C. You are referring to the contents of that note, I presume?"
"I came across a strange handwritten letter on Theodora's desk. It was signed X.C. You are referring to the contents of that note, I presume?"
"I came across a strange handwritten letter on Theodora's desk. It was signed X.C. You are referring to the contents of that note, I presume?"

languages.text: “我在西奥多拉的桌子上发现了一封古怪的手写信件，署名是‘希·卡’。我猜你说的就是那封信上的内容吧？”
languages.original_text: "I came across a strange handwritten letter on Theodora's desk. It was signed X.C. You are referring to the contents of that note, I presume?"

traits.locale_text: “我在西奥多拉的桌子上发现了一封古怪的手写信件，署名是‘希·卡’。我猜你说的就是那封信上的内容吧？”

languages.text: 「テオドラの机に奇妙な手書きの手紙があった。そこには、X.C.と署名されていた。お前が行っているのは、そのメモの内容のことか？」
languages.original_text: "I came across a strange handwritten letter on Theodora's desk. It was signed X.C. You are referring to the contents of that note, I presume?"

traits.locale_text: 「テオドラの机に奇妙な手書きの手紙があった。そこには、X.C.と署名されていた。お前が行っているのは、そのメモの内容のことか？」

languages.text: "Ich habe auf Theodoras Schreibtisch einen seltsamen handgeschriebenen Brief gefunden. Unterschrieben war er mit 'X.C.'. Ich nehme an, dass Ihr darauf anspielt, richtig?"
languages.original_text: "I came across a strange handwritten letter on Theodora's desk. It was signed X.C. You are referring to the contents of that note, I presume?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe auf Theodoras Schreibtisch einen seltsamen handgeschriebenen Brief gefunden. Unterschrieben war er mit 'X.C.'. Ich nehme an, dass Ihr darauf anspielt, richtig?

languages.text: « J'ai trouvé une lettre manuscrite plutôt étrange sur le bureau de Théodora. Elle était signée X.C. Vous faites référence au contenu de cette lettre, j'imagine ? »
languages.original_text: "I came across a strange handwritten letter on Theodora's desk. It was signed X.C. You are referring to the contents of that note, I presume?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai trouvé une lettre manuscrite plutôt étrange sur le bureau de Théodora. Elle était signée X.C. Vous faites référence au contenu de cette lettre, j'imagine ? »

languages.text: «Encontré una carta muy peculiar escrita a mano en el escritorio de Theodora. La firmaban las iniciales X. C. ¿Entiendo que se refiere al contenido de esa nota?».
languages.original_text: "I came across a strange handwritten letter on Theodora's desk. It was signed X.C. You are referring to the contents of that note, I presume?"

traits.locale_text: «Encontré una carta muy peculiar escrita a mano en el escritorio de Theodora. La firmaban las iniciales X. C. ¿Entiendo que se refiere al contenido de esa nota?».

languages.text: "Theodora'nın masasında el yazısıyla yazılmış garip bir mektuba rastladım. X.C. diye imzalanmıştı. Bu pusulanın içeriğinden bahsediyorsun galiba."
languages.original_text: "I came across a strange handwritten letter on Theodora's desk. It was signed X.C. You are referring to the contents of that note, I presume?"

traits.locale_text: "Theodora'nın masasında el yazısıyla yazılmış garip bir mektuba rastladım. X.C. diye imzalanmıştı. Bu pusulanın içeriğinden bahsediyorsun galiba."
